name: Wiz's Tower
description:
Wiz’s Tower

An Elemental wizard on the verge of a breakthrough potion to combine the power of four-elements, fire, water, earth, and air.

While asleep tower is invaded from a wizard whose intention is to steal you research for himself.

You wake up in a new world strip of all your powers apart from the chosen element field that you have mastered.

Objective: Regain your powers by traveling to each world collecting the elemental runes and ultimately retaking the tower and recovering research.      

Key features

  • Use magic to defeat enemies.
  • Traverse biomes reaching each portal.
  • Collect runes. 

Information

Beta release for spring 2021
